altTitles.ja: 薪窯のパンドラ

description.en: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.
description.zh: 追随前人，过往足迹，今日的少女，也在进行烘焙

altTitles.ja: 覇－LORD

description.en: The story is loosely based on the Three Kingdoms period, using both real and original characters and events from the historical period in Chinese history and folklore of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

title.en: Ore no Kouhai no Futokoro ga Fukasugite Kowai.

altTitles.en: My Junior's So Tolerant It's Scary
俺の後輩の懐が深すぎてこわい。

description.en: Kazuma's just your regular office worker… Except for the fact that he likes playing with his ass so much, he's been holding off on masturbating for two weeks. One weekend, on the way home from one of his usual self-loving sessions in a soundproofed, easily-cleaned hotel room… he happens upon his junior colleague Maruyama and gets roped into drinking with him! Later, when carrying a passed-out drunk Maruyama to bed, Kazuma catches sight of Maruyama's raging boner!

altTitles.ja: ペーパーブレイバー

description.en:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

altTitles.ja: チェリーとユニコーン

description.en: The night before his first day in high school, Souta Kashiyama took care of his pet unicorn, Mahoro, and went to sleep as usual. However, the next day when he woke up there was a stranger in his bed!! Could this man actually be his pet unicorn!?!?
description.fr:
La nuit précédent sa première année de lycée, Shouta Kashiyama part se coucher avec son curieux animal de compagnie, une petite licorne. Au réveil, cette dernière s'est transformé en humain !

⋆˙⟡ ⊹

› Un homme-licorne x un étudiant têtu
› Pour les n'oreilles lovers !

⋆˙⟡ ⊹

altTitles.ja: おとなりに銀河

description.en:
After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself. Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl…

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)
description.pt-br: Depois da morte de seu pai, Kuga Ichirou, um mangaká de shoujo recém-saído do colégio, tem que cuidar sozinho dos seus dois irmãos menores, Machi e Fumio. Lutando para cumprir o prazo depois que seus assistentes anteriores estrearam com mangá, ele contrata um novo assistente através do seu editor. Contudo, sua vida tem uma virada inesperada depois que esse novo assistente é revelada ser uma garota linda e misteriosa...

altTitles.ja: モスクワ2160

description.en:
A future where the cold war between the USA and Russia never ended and has been going on for two centuries. 
"Liquidator" Daniel Kuragin runs through Moscow alleyways for score-settling with a submachine gun in hand!  
The overwhelmingly popular web series from "Goblin Slayer" creator Kumo Kagyu has begun publication.
description.ru: Холодная война так и не закончилась, и мир совсем забыл о том, что такое правда, свобода и надежда. Среди промышляющих в советской Москве кибернетизированных бандитов затесался «уборщик» Данила Курагин с целёхоньким телом, действующий сам по себе.
description.pt-br: A história se passa em um mundo onde a Guerra Fria já se estendeu por mais de 2 séculos e a tecnologia evoluiu de forma a criar “sombras mecanizadas”, cujo os objetivos são trabalhar como limpadores em um mundo repleto de conspirações.

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

altTitles.en: ホワイトヌーン、ブラックナイト

description.en: A young man who has a tendency to live in his own fantasy world. Niinuma fell in love with the elite companion, Obata. The first night he spent with him was gentle and sweet. Niinuma could see the different side of him. [It's too late. It was you who invited me]. He surrendered to the intense pleasure he felt that night, but one day he hears a rumor about Obata: "He's a Prince in the Day but a Beast in the Night". What's his true nature?

altTitles.ja: 魔法使いロゼの佐渡ライフ

altTitles.zh: 魔法使萝世的佐渡求生记

altTitles.en: The Sado Life of Rosé the Witch

description.en: A young witch from Isekai, Rose arrived at Sado Island in modern-day Japan. There, she met Sana, a villager girl on the island. Having nowhere to go, Rose decided to live with Sana, and the colorful daily life on Sado Island was waiting for her.
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 〝黒髪〟を理由に、国から半ば追放された魔法使い・ロゼスタリア（通称：ロゼ）。新天地でリスタートしようと、転移して辿り着いた先は…〝佐渡島〟！？島民の女の子・紗菜と一緒に、スローライフを目指して奔走する頑張りコメディ・第1巻！

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: _"Kurokami"_ o riyū ni,-koku kara nakaba tsuihō sa reta mahōtsukai rozesutaria (tsūshō: Roze). Shintenchi de risutāto shiyou to, ten'i shite tadori tsuita saki wa… _"sadogashima"!?_ Tōmin no on'nanoko shana to issho ni, surōraifu o mezashite honsō suru ganbari komedi dai 1-kan!

altTitles.ja: ぼくらはみんなうそばかり

description.en: Shinji leads a dull office life during the day, but he finds a way to escape from the monotony. At night, he lavishes himself with beautiful clothing and… one-night stands. Then along comes Yusei, a young man with the sex skills needed to keep Shinji coming back. Yusei's more earnest than he appears, and wants more from Shinji than just a one-time deal. But, what is it exactly that Yusei desires…?

This brat I’ve been friends with for 8 years confessed to me.

Chan has been quietly liking Dowoon by the side, keeping his feelings hidden to maintain their friendship.
But one day, Dowoon confessed to Chan that he likes him…

However, A scandal breaks out about the actor Dowoon after his confession, and Chan is confused as to whether Dowoon’s confession is sincere or not.
description.fr:
Chan a toujours aimé se fonde dans l’ombre contrairement à Dowoon, qui adore la célébrité. Il n’est donc pas surprenant que Chan ait le coup de foudre pour lui…
Seulement, il garde secrètement ses sentiments.
Mais un beau jour, Dowoon lui demande de devenir son petit ami ?!
À la suite de cet aveu étonnant, un scandale éclate pour Dowoon sur une troublante relation amoureuse avec une autre femme. Chan ne sait plus comment gérer le situation.
Ses sentiments sont-ils vraiment sincères ? Que cache-t-il derrière ce scandale ?

⋆˙⟡ ⊹

› Un friends to lover
› Histoire courte, 5 chapitres

⋆˙⟡ ⊹

altTitles.ja: スピノザ

description.en:
Serialized in Photo Japon across seven chapters, from December 1985 to June 1986.  
  
Each chapter was printed on one page. The format is that of a contact sheet, with the pages shrunk to fit on a single page.

altTitles.ja: 酒処 春來荘日乗

description.en: Fifteen years have passed since the end of the Great War. Thriving at the bottom of the Imperial City of Flowers is the bar Haraiso, run by an idiosyncratic owner, Miss Haru. Various customers visit the restaurant every night, attracted by the delicious sake and snacks...

title.en: That Villain's Life, I'll Live It Once

altTitles.ko: 그 악녀 인생, 제가 한번 살아 볼게요

altTitles.en: The Villainess's Life, I'll Try Living It
I Will Live the Life of a Villainess

description.en:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

title.en: Omega Heroine Wants Her Alpha Villainess

altTitles.zh: 白月光女主总想独占我
Bái Yuèguāng Nǚ Zhǔ Zǒng Xiǎng Dúzhàn Wǒ

altTitles.en: White Moonlight Female Host Always Wants to Monopolize Me
Perfect Heroine Wants to Possess Me

description.en: Ji Xiao accidentally transmigrates into a novel and becomes the Alpha villain who shares the same name as her. To save her life from disaster, she treats the perfect Omega heroine with the upmost care. The heroine, Wei Qingyu, changes her own feelings towards her enemy when faced with her abrupt change of character. She’s even gradually starting to like this “enemy”? The perfect heroine is always trying to possess the female villain, but when will she notice that the other’s heart has already been moved?

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara que ela estava interessada não era um cara

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: A Chinese Fantasy: Law of the Fox

altTitles.ja-ro: 狐の掟 中国幻想選

description.en: When a man saves a fox, the last thing he expects is for her to return to him a beautiful maiden, but gratitude is powerful and so is the law of the fox. When it comes to finding a love match, don't rule out pairing with a tiger, wolf or bear! This collection of seven fantasy short stories is about finding love in the strangest of places.
description.pt-br: Quando um homem salva uma raposa, a última coisa que espera é que ela volte para ele como uma bela donzela, mas a gratidão é poderosa e a lei da raposa também. Quando se trata de encontrar um par amoroso, não descarte o emparelhamento com um tigre, lobo ou urso! Esta coleção de sete contos de fantasia trata de encontrar o amor nos lugares mais estranhos.

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 海皇再起 RERISE OF POSEIDON

altTitles.pt-br: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco - O Retorno de Poseidon

title.en: Kyouran Reijou Nia Liston - Byoujaku Reijou ni Tensei shita Kamigoroshi no Bujin no Karei Naru Musouroku

altTitles.ja: 凶乱令嬢ニア・リストン 病弱令嬢に転生した神殺しの武人の華麗なる無双録

altTitles.en: Brutal Daughter Nia Liston: A Splendid Matchless Record of a God-Slaying Warrior Reincarnated as a Sickly Daughter

altTitles.vi: Cuồng loạn lệnh nương - Nia Liston

description.en:
The strongest reincarnated daughter goes on the rampage! A gripping, otherworldly entertainment!

"I wanted to die fighting anyway."

The great hero, who once even killed a god, wanted to fight even in death. What awaited her was her reincarnation as a sickly noblewoman. In the future world, she becomes the beautiful but too weak Daughter Nia Liston, but in her second life, she goes on a rampage in battle, in delivery activities and in academy life!

This is a record of the brilliant battles of the hero who will eventually be known as the "Wicked Rampant Daughter". The most powerful Warriors' Daughter presents the start of a painful otherworldly entertainment!

Because of his stepfather's gambling debt, Jung Heejae continues to live as a student in the third year of high school, despite having turned twenty. As the threats from the loan sharks become more severe, Heejae ends up escaping to a secluded island in the South, where his grandmother lives. On this island with no internet, Heejae meets a gangster called Cha Beomjoon, and becomes his personal freeze pop errand boy (?)...

altTitles.en: I Cannot Sleep With My Big Brother
兄貴と一緒じゃ眠れない

description.en:
Eight years ago, our parents remarried and we became brothers. Haruto is six years older than me. We're not related by blood, but he treats me kindly and takes care of me as if I were his real brother.  
  
Because of this, I started harboring this desire to monopolize him…  
  
I don't want him to find out about these dirty feelings! Although I live alone now that I started university, my brother found a way to come after me…!?

title.en: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make “Cursed Items”, but They're Artifact Class!

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

altTitles.ja: いとこい
いとこい -人狼編-

description.en:
Volume 1:  
Katsuyuki returns to the town he lived in as a child after being away for ten years, but he's faced with nothing but trouble. In order to try warding off evil spirits, he goes to a shrine to pray. There, he meets an oddly-dressed child with furry ears and a tail, who only Katsuyuki can see. The child follows him home, asking to "feed," and proceeds to kiss Katsuyuki and swallow his spit… "What the? Did he just get taller…? And now he wants to mate with me…!?" The threads of fate interweave in this mysterious anthropomorphic fantasy!  
  
Volume 2:  
Akinori's a rookie high school teacher. On his way home one rainy night, he finds an injured puppy and takes him home. However, he awakes in the morning to find a human child with dog ears and a tail!

altTitles.ja: バーフウラーズ

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!
A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
description.vi: Một nhánh THE iDOLM@STER hoàn toàn mới - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. Truyện giới thiệu về các nhân vật và những điều liên quan đến Học viện tư lập Hatsuboshi.

altTitles.ja: ネコ×ネコ
ネコ×ネコ beginning
ネコ×ネコ hopeful
ネコ×ネコ wedding

description.en:
In high school, Keita Tsukiji was slender and had feminine features. He confessed to an upper-classman who had his ideal body build, Satoshi Murakami, and they started going out.   
  
Three years have passed. The two of them started living together, but there was one big change… Keita had matured and grown to be really manly! Anxious about what Satoshi, who used to be straight, thinks about the situation, Keita is distracted during sex. On the other hand, Satoshi is concerned that he cannot make love to Keita in the same manner that he used to. And then, one night, an aroused Keita pushes Satoshi down…?!

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Be Liked By That Shy Girl

altTitles.ja: プライスレス・ハニー

description.en:
A collection of stories:  
  
• Priceless Honey (chap 1-2)  
Suguri Nagisa, the custodian at an all-boys' school, works at a secret - and quite risque - part-time job. But what happens when a teacher from the school discovers "Call Boy" Nagisa?  
  
• Fine Play  
Nanafuji is a regular customer at the cafe where Kaji works at as a waiter. The two became quite friendly when Kaji returned Nanafuji's lost cellphone to him. Kaji told Nanafuji that he had a problem with a stalker and the latter suggested that he should pretend to be Kaji's lover to make the stalker give up on Kaji…  
  
• Yandere Master  
  
• Replay  
At his brother's wedding, Fumiya sees Mitsugu for the first time in six years. With their complicated history, and Mitsugu's feelings for Fumiya's brother, they have a lot to hash out.  
  
• Fall in XXX  
Both wear glasses, but their personalities are too different. Tadashi's senpai is studying hard to get into Tokyo University to chase after a girl, so they have become classmates at prep school. One night, his senpai invites Tadashi over to help study for the secondary exams. What will Tadashi do with the feelings that he's kept hidden for so long, let they're alone in his senpai's room…  
  
• Back Stage  
Sequel to chap 3

title.en: Kono Hoshi de Ichiban Akarui Tokoro

altTitles.ja: この星でいちばん明るいところ

description.en: Yuki, who's had his heart broken by his childhood friend, runs into a teacher who kisses him out of the blue and tells him: "Let me comfort you". The perfect teacher with a not-so-honest high-schooler come together in a mature romance.
description.fr: L'histoire de deux amis d'enfance et de comment ils trouvent l'amour, l'un avec un camarade de classe et l'autre avec un professeur. Trois chapitres sont consacrés au premier couple et deux au second, plus un extra pour chacun.

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.ja: ハッピーセピア
ハッピーセピア: 大熊らすこ作品集

altTitles.en: Happy Sepia: The works of Okuma Rasuko

description.en: High school girl Kaede decided to travel back in time for her beloved benefactor, Minami. Let's see how her determination will change the flow of time. This is a time slip 4-koma manga connected by wishes and wills!
description.ja:
高校1年生のかえでは大好きな人のために過去へ旅立つことに。
彼女の想いがどう流れを変えていくのか…！
想いが想いを繋ぐタイムトラベル4コマ！

title.en: Houkago no Idol ni wa Himitsu ga aru

altTitles.en: The After School Idol Has a Secret

altTitles.ja: 放課後のアイドルには秘密がある

altTitles.ru: У школьных айдолов есть свои секреты

altTitles.zh: 放学后的偶像有一个秘密

altTitles.zh-ro: Fàngxué hòu de ǒuxiàng yǒu yīgè mìmì

description.en:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
description.ja: 僕のクラスには、正真正銘のアイドルがいる」超エリート校に進学した高校一年生の昼野は、入学最初の学力テストで記入ミスにより赤点を出し補習を受けることになる。しかし、その補習にはもう一人参加者がいて…？

title.en: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei

altTitles.ja: 恋に恋するコイビト関係

altTitles.en: Becoming Her Lover For the Sake of Love

description.en:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

altTitles.ja: フィルター越しのカノジョ

description.en: Hakobe Narumi is an expressionless high schooler known as Stoney. The highlight of his unnoticeable existence is following posts from the popular selfie poster "Efa" on social media. But it turns out "Efa" is his studious and popular classmate Mitsuha Koto?! The slightly erotic, adolescent, selfie, romantic comedy between an Iron Walled Selfie girl and a stone-faced boy begins!
description.ja: つねに無表情な能面高校生・箱部成海。クラスでも存在感激うすな彼の人生の楽しみは、SNSで人気のえっちな自撮り女子「えふぁ」の投稿を追いかけること。しかし、その「えふぁ」の正体が、真面目で誰からも好かれるクラスメイトの三葉琴であることを知ってしまいーー⁉︎鉄壁自撮り女子✖️能面男子のちょっとえっちな青春自撮りラブコメ開幕‼︎
description.ru: Хакобэ Наруми — невыразительный старшеклассник по прозвищу «Каменнолицый». Его незаметное существование состоит в том, что он следит за постами популярного эротического аккаунта «Эфа» в соцсетях. Но оказывается, что «Эфа» — это его одноклассница Мицуха Кото! Начинается слегка эротическая, подростковая, селфи-романтическая комедия между селфи-девочкой с железной стеной и парнем с каменным лицом!

altTitles.ja: サツドウ

description.en: Akamori Mitsuo wants to be an ordinary salaryman but... He is a genius murderer born into a family that has been practising the ancient art of killing for centuries. Akamori faces obstacles like Yakuza, fighters and gangs in the path that goes to his want.
description.fr: Akamori Mitsuo veut être un salarié ordinaire mais... C’est un meurtrier de génie né dans une famille qui pratique l’art ancien de tuer depuis des siècles. Akamori fait face à des obstacles comme Yakuza, des combattants et des gangs sur le chemin qui mène à son besoin.
description.vi: Một seri mới từ tác giả của Rocopon. Akamori Rikuo, con trai thứ 6 và là một võ sĩ thiên tài trong một gia tộc sở hữu môn võ sát nhân gia truyền từ thời xa xưa. Vậy nhưng Rikuo lại muốn được trở thành một anh nhân viên văn phòng bình thường và giờ đây cuộc sống của cậu sẽ bị lũ lưu manh, đám xã hội đen và những tay võ sĩ khác làm đảo lộn không ngừng.

altTitles.ja: ゴミ屋敷の鎌倉さん

description.en:
Exhausted by his job, Kamakura shut himself in a house overflowing with garbage.
But his time, which stopped on "that day", started moving forward once again when a neighbor he had never spoken to before stepped into his house.

A good-natured neighbor x a traumatised resident of a dirty room
Boys' love tale of rescue and rehabilitation drawn by a genius newcomer.

An action packed suspense story of a boy who obtains the absolute authority! 
The story centers around a boy named " Hwang Chomin"  who spends his high school days while enduring its unjust violent treatment. Being informed of his isolated brother's passing away, he receives his phone and confronts the truth about his brother. He learns that his brother is the leader of a notorius ring called [Emperor's Division]. Upon learning that he decides to impersonate his brother and take control of the division by passing judgment on it's scums. And so the King's Game that must be never revealed begins!

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en: Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.

altTitles.ja: あいまいなウルフ

description.en: Shiroki just wants a little bit of peace and quiet―time to chill with his cat and relax in between all his university classes. However, his next door neighbor, Hayato, seems unable to do anything without making a racket. Which is the last thing Shiroki wants to deal with on any given day. And so life goes on, until his cat decides to climb onto Hayato’s balcony, leading Shiroki to an unexpectedly furry discovery...
description.fr:
Kaneki a un voisin très bruyant et ennuyant, Hayato.
Un jour, le chat de Kaneki décide de partir en balade chez Hayato et tout en le poursuivant, il le découvre avec des jolies petites oreilles et une queue !

⋆˙⟡ ⊹

› Un enemie to lovers
› Un homme loup x étudiant calme
› Pour les n'oreilles lovers

⋆˙⟡ ⊹

description.en: The 10th Aki★Eda Touhou Project Fanbook. Centers around Komachi x Eiki.

title.en: My Fiancé is in Love with My Little Sister

altTitles.ja-ro: Konyakusha wa, watashi no imouto ni koi o suru

altTitles.en: My Fiancé falls in love with my sister.

altTitles.ja: 婚約者は、私の妹に恋をする

altTitles.vi: Vị Hôn Phu Của Tôi Đã Rơi Vào Lưới Tình Với Em Gái

description.en:
There my fiancé stood, gazing intently at my charming younger sister. When I saw them fall in love the moment they laid eyes on each other, I was hit with an overwhelming sense of déjà vu. Aah, again?
My fiancé had been in love with my younger sister even in my previous life. There was nothing I could do but watch it all unfold. And for some inexplicable reason, I’m the only one who keeps returning to that exact point in time. Trapped by fate. And yet, amidst the turns of the hourglass, I still find myself falling for him…

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

description.en:
When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split chapter parts) (S1) + >197 (S2) = >344 chapters
- **Season 1:** vol. 1 ch. 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** vol. 2 ch. 1-197+ (148-344+) (ongoing)

**Note:** season 1 chapter 1-114 is in single page format. Starting with season 1 chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。
